tasks.task_description: Verify VS Code server process is running
Check if VS Code server port is accessible

description: Check VS Code server status on spot EC2 instance and web accessibility
context: No EC2 instances found in us-east-1 region, including no spot instances
Found running spot EC2 instance in us-west-2: i-0fbd3030d76e9f6ca (m6a.2xlarge) with public IP 100.20.106.120 and DNS ec2-100-20-106-120.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com
VS Code server setup is still in progress. Cloud-init is running and currently installing Node.js. The setup script is at phase 4 (Enhanced Development Tools Installation).
